mapper.select: SELECT resource.id AS id,resource.name AS `name`,resource.interceptUrl AS interceptUrl, resource.remark as remark,role.id AS roleId , role.name AS roleName,privilege_resource.orderBy AS orderBy FROM t_role role INNER JOIN t_role_privilege role_privilege ON role.id=role_privilege.role_id INNER JOIN t_privilege privilege ON privilege.id = role_privilege.privilege_id INNER JOIN t_privilege_resource privilege_resource ON privilege.id = privilege_resource.privilegeId INNER JOIN t_resource resource ON resource.id = privilege_resource.resourceId
SELECT r.id,r.name,r.interceptUrl,r.remark FROM t_privilege_resource pr INNER JOIN t_resource r ON pr.resourceId = r.id WHERE pr.privilegeId = #{privilegeId}
